name: Followup, New serious AE reported
description:
- Select “Yes” if its never been reported before
- Check Adverse Events log for more info
- If yes, please fill out the "SAE Form"

name: Followup, New AE of clinical significance
description:
- Select “Yes” if its never been reported before
- Check Adverse Events log for more info
- If yes, please fill out the "AE Form"
Adverse Events of clinical significance are:
- AEs of Interest (list printed in the EndTB Clinical Guide)
- AEs that result in (1) a regimen or drug temporary interruption, (2) a permanent discontinuation or change in drug dosage directed by the treating physician
- AEs otherwise judged to be clinically significant by the treating physician
shortname: New adverse event of clinical significance reported

name: Followup, Admitted into a hospital for any reason
description:
- Includes for surgery
- If yes, please fill out the "Hospital Discharge Summary Form"
shortname: Patient admitted into a hopital for any reason, since last visit
